1. Mayor and City Council

Mayor and City Council
======================

* The first and third Tuesday of every month (Only on the first Tuesday during July and December).
* City Hall
  111 W. Lyndale Ave.
  Council Chambers
  Robinson, TX 76706

| Member | Position |
| --- | --- |
| [Greg May](https://www.robinsontexas.org/Directory.aspx?EID=14) | Mayor |
| [Jimmy Rogers](https://www.robinsontexas.org/Directory.aspx?EID=24) | Place 1 |
| [Jeremy Stivener](https://www.robinsontexas.org/Directory.aspx?EID=18) | Place 2 |
| [Charlie Burch](https://robinsontexas.org/directory.aspx?EID=16) | Place 3 |

| Tim Holtkamp | Place 5 |
| [Donnie Finn](https://www.robinsontexas.org/Directory.aspx?EID=21) | Place 6 |



First incorporated in 1955 as a General Law City, Robinson adopted a charter in 1999 and is now a Home Rule City operating with the Council-Manager form of government. The seven-member elected City Council sets policy and appoints a City Manager who is responsible for the day to day operations.

**City of Robinson Home Rule Charter:**

* [Amended City of Robinson Charter - Adopted by Ordinance 2021-014 June 1, 2021](https://www.robinsontexas.org/DocumentCenter/View/3481/Amended-City-of-Robinson-Charter-Adopted-by-Ordinance-2021-014-on-June-1-2021)
* [City of Robinson Home Rule Charter (Original Document, Scanned) (PDF)](https://www.robinsontexas.org/DocumentCenter/View/267)
* [City of Robinson Home Rule Charter (Re-Typed from Original Content) (PDF)](https://www.robinsontexas.org/DocumentCenter/View/266)

* [City Meetings](https://www.robinsontexas.org/594/Virtual-City-Hosted-Public-Meetings)
